body_html:
Regarding the beamsearch, you are right, I copied the code wrong (now it is fixed) but the results are the same - [[0 1 0 1]] - still incorrect.

As for the greedy decoder, I do not understand why you think the code is wrong. The code acts for me as expected. The comments, on the other hand, are certainly wrong, just the fact that the result has 5 B's and the input has 4.

body:
Regarding the beamsearch, you are right, I copied the code wrong (now it is fixed) but the results are the same - [[0 1 0 1]] - still incorrect.

As for the greedy decoder, I do not understand why you think the code is wrong. The code acts for me as expected. The comments, on the other hand, are certainly wrong, just the fact that the result has 5 B's and the input has 4.
